about_the_game:
【Story】

On a hot and humid summer day, a Japanese man was enjoying a carefree journey on his moped.

The man's name was Kazuki Uchida.

He was heading to a secluded hotel deep in Fukui Prefecture, but his destination was still far away, and dusk was approaching.

While checking his map and drinking a can of coffee in the parking lot of a convenience store, he noticed something.

"It looks like I can get there without having to go around the forest if I take this route."

His map showed a narrow path through the forest that seemed like a shortcut to his destination.

He gulped down the coffee, gripped the handlebars of his beloved bike, and set off...

【How to Play】

The goal is to obtain four repair parts for the bike, and escape from the forest.

Creatures, the remains of the victims of a massacre that once took place in the forest, will chase you, but try to evade them and escape!

Be careful, as touching them will result in instant death and a return to the start!

There is no save function in the game.

Collect forgotten memories (purple square objects) scattered in the forest to view content as a bonus.

【Controls】

W ... Forward

A ... Move Left

D ... Move Right

S ... Backward

Shift ... Run

E ... Item List

ESC ... Options Screen / Cancel

Move Mouse ... Move Camera

Left Click ... Item Acquire/Use / Confirm

(While Operating the Bike)

Move Mouse ... Turn Left-Right

【About Streaming】

There are no restrictions, so feel free to stream as you like.

【About The Forest of Fear】

This game is developed with official approval and supervision by Kazz, the original creator of "Death Forest: Escape from the Forest" and "DeathForest: Escape from the Forest [Proliferation]."

【Finally】

This game is a horror game.

For those with courage, we recommend playing in a dark room with headphones on!

name: Death Forest Abyss

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: intel Core i7 4770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Escape from the Forest of Fear by searching for the broken bike parts while running away from the creatures that are the remains of the massacre victims!
supported_languages:
English*, Traditional Chinese*, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
